inclusion.criterion: study staff member will describe the study and offer participation
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: patient agrees to participate, signs research protocol and HIPAA consent forms
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: patient's chart is flagged indicating she is a study participant
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: prenatal care and labor and delivery are managed by her physician per standard of care
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: cesarean section is performed per physician discretion
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: pain level is assessed on the first and third or fourth day after surgery and again at six weeks
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: pregnant women undergoing primary or repeat cesarean section
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: maternal age greater than or equal to 18 years of age
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: gestational age greater than or equal to 34 weeks
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: she is working as an editor in a publisher company and she is happy that she can keep working from home most of the time
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: History of drug or alcohol abuse
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient has a confirmed diagnosis of Relapsing Remitting Multiple Sclerosis (RRMS) and is under treatment for 7 months. She smokes 10 cigarettes per day and drinks alcohol occasionally.
